    static bool contains(const std::u32string_view value) noexcept
    {
        if (value.length() != 1u)
            return false;

        if (value == U"æ" || value == U"à" || value == U"ä" || value == U"ö" || value == U"ü" || value == U"ß" || value == U"é" || value == U"è" || value == U"ê" || value == U"ç" || value == U"ñ" || value == U"ø" || value == U"å")

        return false;
    }
